titles.title: Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight Funding Reform Act of 2002

To amend the Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and Soundness Act of 1992 to provide that funding for the Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight is made available in the same manner as other financial institutions regulatory agencies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Capital Markets, Insurance and Government Sponsored Enterprises.

committee.subcommittee: Capital Markets, Insurance and Government Sponsored Enterprises
committee.name: House Financial Services

bill.summary: 10/21/2002--Introduced. Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight Funding Reform Act of 2002 - Amends the Federal Housing Enterprises Financial Safety and Soundness Act of 1992 to make funding available for the Office of Federal Housing Enterprise Oversight without reference to "the extent provided in appropriation Acts."
